property.name: usersByUsernameQuery
property.value: select u.code, u.name, u.password, u.active, 0 accountExpired, 0 credentialsExpired,0 accountLocked, u.clientid clientId, c.code clientCode, c.defaultDsAccessRule, c.defaultImportPath, c.defaultExportPath, c.tempPath, c.adminRole, c.systemClient, '', 0, f.extjsDateFormat, f.extjsTimeFormat, f.extjsDateTimeFormat, f.extjsAltFormats, f.javaDateFormat, f.javaTimeFormat, f.javaDateTimeFormat , u.decimalseparator, u.thousandseparator, asg.name asgnName, asg.id asgnId from AD_USR u join AD_CLIENT c on u.clientid = c.id left join AD_SYS_DTFMT f on u.dateformat_id = f.id left join AD_ASGNBL asg on u.code = asg.usercode where u.code = ? and c.code = ?

property.name: authoritiesByUsernameQuery
property.value: select u.code , r.name from AD_USR_ROLE ur, AD_ROLE r, AD_USR u, AD_CLIENT c where ur.users_id = u.id and ur.roles_id = r.id and u.clientid = c.id and u.code = ? and c.code = ?

property.name: changePasswordSql
property.value: update AD_USR set password = ? where code = ? and clientid = ?

property.name: checkCurrentPasswordSql
property.value: select count(1) from AD_USR a where a.code = ? and a.password = ?

property.name: authActionQuery
property.value: select distinct 1 from AD_ACL_ASGN acl where acl.dsname = ? and exists ( select 1 from AD_ROLE_ACLS rac where rac.accessControls_id = acl.accessControl_id and rac.roles_id in ( select ur.roles_id from AD_USR_ROLE ur where ur.users_id in ( select u.id from AD_USR u where u.code = ? ) ) )

property.name: authActionQuery
property.value: select distinct 1 from AD_ACL_DS acl where acl.dsname = ? and exists ( select 1 from AD_ROLE_ACLS rac where rac.accessControls_id = acl.accessControl_id and rac.roles_id in ( select ur.roles_id from AD_USR_ROLE ur where ur.users_id in ( select u.id from AD_USR u where u.code = ? ) ))

property.name: authServiceMethodQuery
property.value: select distinct 1 from AD_ACL_DS_SRV acl where acl.dsname = ? and exists ( select 1 from AD_ROLE_ACLS rac where rac.accessControls_id = acl.accessControl_id and rac.roles_id in ( select ur.roles_id from AD_USR_ROLE ur where ur.users_id in ( select u.id from AD_USR u where u.code = ? ) ))
